author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KRISTY FORECAST TO BECOME A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE LATER TODAY...
summary:
...KRISTY FORECAST TO BECOME A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE LATER TODAY...
 As of 2:00 AM PDT Sun Oct 27
 the center of Kristy was located near 22.0, -129.8
 with movement NW at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.
